Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery type B kantharos; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior reserved with painted inscriptioin.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim, and they have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis. Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983.
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 166, no. 60a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1817) (phase 2)
